name: Agentic AI SDLC Maturity Model Infographic

style.aesthetic: modern enterprise tech, clean, minimal, high-contrast
style.palette_hint: cool blues + neutral grays + one accent color (e.g., teal)
style.icon_style: simple line icons with occasional filled accent

content.title: Agentic AI Coding Maturity Model
content.subtitle: How the engineer’s role and the AI’s autonomy evolve — depth vs breadth

main_chart.annotation: Levels progress diagonally: more autonomy (up) and larger scope (right).

right_panel.title: What changes as you level up

sections.heading: Quality signal shift
bullets: Line-by-line review → PR review + tests → CI gates + functional checks → eval harness + monitoring

inset_chart.title: Productivity (heuristic bands)
inset_chart.note: Illustrative only—depends on test maturity, CI speed, domain complexity, and tool friction.

footer.small_text: Tip: show ranges (bands), not promises. Pair with KPIs like cycle time, PR throughput, test coverage, and adoption.

rendering_instructions.text_limits: Keep each node under 6 short lines
rendering_instructions.use_callouts: Badges for add-ons; avoid dense paragraphs

prompt:
Create a clean, modern enterprise-tech infographic in 16:9 landscape.

TITLE: "Agentic AI Coding Maturity Model"
SUBTITLE: "How the engineer’s role and the AI’s autonomy evolve — depth vs breadth"

MAIN VISUAL (CENTER): a 2D chart with five labeled nodes along a diagonal.
- X-axis label: "Breadth (Unit of Work)" with ticks: "Snippet", "File", "Story", "Feature", "Milestone/Program"
- Y-axis label: "Depth (Capability / Autonomy)" with ticks: "Autocomplete", "Supervised Implementer", "PR Owner", "Specialist Team", "Agent Org"

Place five nodes on a diagonal from bottom-left to top-right. Each node is a rounded rectangle card with:
- Level number (1–5)
- Level name (bold)
- 3 short lines: Human role, AI role, Unit of work
- 1 short line: Primary quality signal

NODE CONTENT (exact text):
1) Autocomplete Assist
   Human: Author (drives)
   AI: Completer (suggests)
   Unit: Snippets / lines
   Quality: Human inspection

2) Supervised Agent Coding
   Human: Pair + Supervisor (approves actions)
   AI: Junior implementer (step-by-step)
   Unit: Files / tasks
   Quality: Human review + quick tests

3) PR-Submitting Agent
   Human: Reviewer + Approver
   AI: Story implementer + PR author
   Unit: Story (ticket)
   Quality: PR review + tests
   Add badge: "Model routing"

4) Multi-Agent Orchestration
   Human: Lead + Integrator
   AI: Specialists in parallel
   Unit: Features / small milestones
   Quality: CI gates + functional checks
   Add badges: "Model routing", "Council of experts", "Project memory (RAG)"

5) Agent Organization (Hierarchical)
   Human: Manager + Governor
   AI: Hierarchical team with evals
   Unit: Milestones / programs
   Quality: Evals + monitoring + audits
   Add badges: "Council of experts", "Project memory", "Evals", "Voice ops"

RIGHT SIDE PANEL: a clean sidebar titled "What changes as you level up" with three sections:
A) "Human role shift" with one line: "Author → Pair/Supervisor → Reviewer → Lead/Integrator → Manager/Governor"
B) "Quality signal shift" with one line: "Line-by-line review → PR review + tests → CI gates + functional checks → eval harness + monitoring"
C) "Advanced add-ons" bullet list:
- Model routing (L3+)
- Council of experts / ensembles (L4–5)
- Project memory: RAG / knowledge graph (L4–5)
- Voice ops (L5)
- Evals + monitoring (L5)

INSET CHART (BOTTOM-LEFT): small chart titled "Productivity (heuristic bands)" showing an upward curve with five banded ranges labeled by level:
L1: 1.05×–1.3×
L2: 1.2×–2×
L3: 1.5×–4×
L4: 2×–8×
L5: 3×–15×
Add a note beneath: "Illustrative only — depends on test maturity, CI speed, domain complexity, and tool friction."

FOOTER (BOTTOM): small text: "Tip: show ranges (bands), not promises. Pair with KPIs like cycle time, PR throughput, test coverage, and adoption."

STYLE:
- Minimal, modern, high readability; lots of whitespace.
- Use a cool palette (blues/neutral grays) with one accent (teal) for badges.
- Simple line icons next to Human and AI lines (person icon, robot icon).
- Ensure all text is readable at 100% zoom (poster-like).
